Hmmm...
Well so far I've only watched the first episode from this torrent and it's not a DVD rip, it's from TV.  Also, at around 37:11 [and through to the end], it changes from widescreen to having black bars on the sides.  Very strange...
Other than that, the episode is very good quality.  Hope the rest don't suffer from these issues.

2nd Ep is also TV rip and at about 33:22 gets black bars on the sides...  3rd through 9th Ep are also TV rip, but doesn't suffer from the black bars...
I don't normally assume things, but the 2nd season appears to be TV rip as well, so I'm going to assume that the whole torrent is TV rips.
Anyone know where I can get a high quality DVD rip?
